name: Based Pepe
description: Based Pepe ($PEPE) is a BASE token focused around the iconic Pepe the Frog meme. Based Pepe takes advantage of the speed and low cost of BASE transactions to provide a token for retail audiences who are true fans of the original, canonical Pepe the Frog from Boy's Club, originally created by Matt Furie. Base Pepe is a memecoin with no intrinsic investment value, it is meant to be held and sent to others as a fun way to engage with blockchain technology while celebrating Pepe the Frog, an internet icon.
